content: this crocheted belt pattern is quick and easy to work up great item for trendy craft sales the pattern has 4 sizes xs and s m l in brackets but is easily modifiable loops & threads capri yarn is a cotton blend that is soft and stretchy it s great to work with and even better to wear pattern is worked in a row widthwise then turned and worked on the other side of the foundation chain belt ties are worked separately and attached at the ends of the belt
